news_header: Trump claims Palestinians won't return to Gaza as he plans to own the region and relocate Gazans.
news_original_title: Trump Foxille: ”Omistaisin Gazan” – palestiinalaisilla ei olisi oikeutta palata
news_text: President Donald Trump stated that Palestinians would not have the right to return to Gaza in the future, as he intends to own the region. He mentioned plans to relocate Gazans to various locations with better housing conditions. This forced displacement could be interpreted as ethnic cleansing, which is classified as a war crime. Trump will discuss his vision for Gaza in an interview with Fox News later today.
